response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which holds immense value to you at $15,000. Considering its exceptional quality and unique benefits, I propose an offer that aims to maximize the value for both of us. For this extraordinary opportunity, I am extending a special deal at a price of $12,000. This offer is designed to be mutually beneficial, ensuring you receive a product that meets your expectations while allowing me to achieve a fair return for my investment. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
